title: Womens Dress Cocktail V Neck Sleeveless

category: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry > Women > Clothing > Dresses > Cocktail

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Got lots of compliments!
items.body: Great dress for the $. I’m 160 lbs, 5’6, large busted 40 DD. Like others said, the armholes are big, I did have to them it in, I hand sewed them by overlapping the sequins (by hand needle & thread) and you never noticed it. This dress is a bit stretchy so was nice. I bought a large & a xlg and kept the lg as it fit perfectly because of it stretching. Read more
items.author: AZBonnie

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars More of a loose fit - not super flattering for my body type
items.body: This dress is sized well (as in accurate to the measurements listed), but I'm not in love with the fit. It's a bit looser than I was anticipating and isn't super flattering for my body type, in my opinion. For reference, my measurements are 38DD (in US sizing), 155 lbs, bust 39-40", and hips 43". I'm usually a size XL and decided to go with the XL size for this dress, as the hips for the XL size was listed as 42.9" and the bust was listed as 40.9. I was worried I wouldn't fit into the L. After trying this dress on, I would be concerned about sizing down because I had to do some pulling and tugging to get the dress over my bust and into place (only for it to look loose once on). The dress appears to be made well - I haven't had any issues with the sequins falling off. I did feel like I needed to be very careful putting on the dress and taking it off, but that would be the case with any dress like this. It's also not very comfortable to wear, but again, I feel like this would be the same with similar dresses. I ordered this for a New Years Eve party and I may still end up wearing it, but I'm definitely going to have to think on it. If you're familiar with sequin dresses, it may be worth a shot, but if you are someone who is sensitive to how clothes feel on your skin, you may want to look for a dress than doesn't have sequins. Leaving this at 4 stars because my dislike of the feeling of sequins is a personal thing, but I still feel like the fit could have been better and more flattering. Read more
items.author: Sabrina K.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality and arrived as advertised
items.body: Arrived on time and as advertised. Fit is as expected Read more
items.author: Shelly M. Arnold

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Stylish
items.body: Its pretty to wear but, the sequins keep coming off. Read more
items.author: Sarah Sung

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly as depicted in the product photos.
items.body: The media could not be loaded. This dress is a higher quality and nicer design than I would have expected for the price. The sequins used are large and round, which means they reflect the lights or the movement of the lights over the dress (see the cool shimmer in the attached video for how it looks under moving lights). It is surprisingly high quality, with the sequins being well affixed. It is lined and the construction of the dress is good, with solid seaming and a good basic 20's flapper cut. It's surprisingly light in weight, so easy to wear and quite comfortable. I am 5'5" and 155 lbs with a size 42 DD chest area and the dress fit me perfectly. I have underarm boobs spillage and I was worried that this dress would not cover it, but in my case it was perfect coverage. I think a lot of whether or not the armholes will work for you has to do with the kind of bra you are wearing. My bras are always tight enough that I can tuck that side spillage into my bra if need be. Overall, surprisingly high quality dress for the money. And it certainly makes a fun statement. Read more
items.author: Zamboni

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars The dress is not as it appears
items.author: Celeste Epps

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sparkle, Shine, Go! This is a Showstopper!
items.body: The sparkle on this dress can be seen from a mile away. It is truly a showstopper. It’s such a fun, sassy, festive look and I can already picture it for New Year’s Eve, holiday parties, or even a Christmas event. I love the mix of large and small sequins because it gives the dress dimension and shine without looking cheap. The gold color is stunning, especially against my skin tone, so I’m really glad I chose it over other available colors. My only complaint is that the fit is a bit boxy. I wish it had more stretch or came in a smaller size, because I’d prefer it to be a little more fitted to show my shape. As it is, the straight cut makes me look wider than I am, so I may take it to a seamstress to bring it in on the sides. One thing to note: the sequins do catch on hair, so this is definitely a “hair up” kind of dress if you don’t want tangles or snags all night. It also has that slightly “crispy” feel most sequin dresses have, and I did lose a few sequins while trying it on but nothing noticeable. On the upside, the dress isn’t heavy at all. It has the look of a full glam sequin dress without feeling like you’re wearing armor. Overall, it’s a great value for the price as it’s flashy, fun, and perfect for a big night out, just be prepared for a few sequins to shed and maybe a trip to the tailor if you want a more defined silhouette. Read more
items.author: Elleindeed19

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegant, shiny, with a minimalist cut
items.body: This sequin dress in E-Pink from JASGOOD is elegant, shiny, with a minimalist cut. You get a lot of bang for your buck with this tank style dress. It feels great on. It looks great and can accommodate many body shapes. The cut of the tank style dress is comfortable and beautiful. And you can definitely travel with this dress without having to fuss too much with it. It will not wrinkle. And it hangs beautifully on the body. I did find that the armholes are very generous, which can be a plus for some of us, and can be a minus for some of us, too. I think this dress is great, and it is certainly worth a try. I’m glad that I chose this style and color, and will be reaching for this dress for dressy occasions. Read more
items.author: Calving Around

short_description:
Womens Dress Cocktail V Neck Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Dress Cocktail V Neck Sleeveless is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: G-champagne Gold, H-wine Red, E-pink, F-green, A-silver, B-black, D-red, C-rose Gold. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
